# Statistical Tests and Parameter Estimations in R Cheatsheet

Candong Chen 

This project includes a pdf version cheatsheet for Statistical Tests and Parameter Estimations in R. This includes moment estimation, MLE, EM algorithm, distribution estimation, parametric tests, bivariate correlation test, and nonparametric tests.

Click the following link to check out the cheatsheet:
https://github.com/Kimtanyo/EDAV/blob/master/latex/statistical_test_and_parameter_test_in_r.pdf
